attributes.action: Stop selling off public assets in the false name of austerity.
attributes.additional_details:
Video breaks austerity myth:
http://www.thecanary.co/2016/02/03/editor-chief-canary-smashes-austerity-bits-video/

why are rail fares extortionate? :
http://gu.com/p/4ffcp?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other

Post office sold privately:
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/money/markets/article-3111010/Government-sell-remainder-Royal-Mail-shares-raise-1-5bn.html

Article explaining privatisation surge in NHS:
http://www.thecanary.co/2016/02/08/cameron-just-launched-privatisation-surge-end-nhs-time-leaves-office/
attributes.background:
The Tories have privatised MORE in 6 years than Thatcher's government did in 10. 
The Post Office was sold off for record losses. 
The NHS is being sold off piece by piece under our noses. 
If you feel 'free' (paid by YOUR taxes) healthcare is essential to a healthy,prospering society, sign.
